title: Bronze Bimbo's - If you're looking flex buddies, join our discord!
body:
Hey guys,

Just created a discord for all you boys and girls out there that just wanna chill and play some league with a bunch of mates in flex.
Specifically for Bronze - Gold but if you're a high elo player and have a smurf, come and join us for some fun!

It doesn't matter if you're not very good or don't have very good social skills, everybody is welcome!

https://discord.gg/DdYrVJd

replies.body: Don't you guys play with that Samuelror? i vs'd u he was that challenger smurf who got banned for elo boosting
yeah i saw him on the forums posting about boosting before he got banned i think he had like a 100% win rate in plat
Yeah i played agaisnt that samuelror guy in ranked on his main and he fucking smoked me aye, i think he is the best ADC in Oceanic untill he got banned for boosting
Yeah lol WTF happened to him he was a freak ae
Almost too good , like the faker of every champion ae, DAT LUCIAN THO
I think he actually got banned for just being too good lol

dont play with them thay will steal your wifes
XD

Come and join the fun guys! This discord is also for people who want to climb and improve their flex rank whilst meeting some mates at the same time, the only thing stopping you from meeting new people is yourself. We've also incorporated a rank up system, where the more you active you post in the channel you'll be rewarded with experience and be able to increase your rank from bronze all the way to challenger just for some extra fun. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
